#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

int main() {
    ll test;
    cin >> test;
    while(test--) {
        ll n, k, i, j;
        cin >> n >> k;
        ll a[n];
        for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
            cin >>  a[i];
        sort(a, a + n);
        ll sum = 0;
        ll ans[n];
        j = 0;
        memset(ans, 0, sizeof(ans));
        for(i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
            if(abs(a[i] - a[i+1]) <= k) {
                sum++;
            }
            else {
                sum++;
                ans[j] = sum;
                sum = 0;
                j++;
            }
            
            if(i == n-2) {
                ans[j] = sum + 1;
                j++;
            }
        }
        ll maxv = INT_MIN;
        for(i = 0; i < j; i++) {
            if(maxv < ans[i])
                maxv = ans[i];
        }
        cout << maxv << endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
